title: Emerald & Diamond Jhumkaalu: A Touch of Traditional Elegance
materials: High-Quality Cubic Zirconia (CZ). Showcases a brilliant Hyderabadi Polish.
features: These exquisite jhumkas feature a delicate floral stud adorned with a vibrant green emerald at its center, encircled by sparkling CZ stones. The bell-shaped (jhumka) body is intricately filigreed and studded with CZ, creating a dazzling effect. Finished with graceful, dangling spherical accents.
colors: Predominantly Golden with emerald green accents and brilliant white CZs.
occasions: or any special occasion where you wish to showcase traditional South Indian grace. Adds a touch of sophisticated charm to modern ethnic wear.
description: Timeless design blending traditional jhumka style with modern sparkle. The vibrant emerald adds a touch of regality, making it a heirloom-worthy piece. Lightweight and comfortable for extended wear. The Hyderabadi polish gives it a rich, lustrous finish that is unmatched.
